extendedInfo.description: - Simple and direct, everything can be written down quickly. - Mark each item with 7 colors, just like the rainbow.- Handy Search feature, you can find your memories easily.- Share your memorized items to friends.- App background switches automaticall each day.- All items can be exported to SD card as text file.- Add more beautiful background images to choose from.1.62- Minor bug fix. (Thanks to user feedback)1.61- Font size for memories can be adjusted in 'Setting'- Add support of no more Ads in 'More'- UI, feature improvement1.6- Images can be added now.- New 'Read mode' makes reviewing easier.- Custom background available.- Filters added for item search result.- Orientation lock for editor.- Can 'Move to SD' now(may depend on ROM).- UI improvements.1.31- Fix display issue for tablets1.3- Fix display issue for large font setting- 3 more clean backgrounds- Order change for 'All' memories- UI polishing- Minor bug fixes1.2.1- Add zh-TW translation1.2- Data can be backup/restore to your SD card now. All items can be retrieved easily after re-install your app for some reason.- Add weekday display.- Export txt no longer overwrite old file now.- UI detail updates.
